en.title: Escaping the Information Cocoon
en.prompt: Below is a set of words that form an information cocoon. You need to output information related to these words based on a number I give (up to 100). The larger the number, the less relevant the information you provide should be to the information cocoon. Please respond according to this principle, and parse and respond to the following words:
en.remark: Use it to discover what you don't know. Contributed by @ergf991.

metaDescription: Want to break out of your information bubble? Provide a set of keywords, and this prompt will give you related information that becomes less relevant the higher the number you choose.
